title: Deepika Padukone Talks About Her Accent Being Mocked To Becoming The Voice Of Meta AI, Calls It "Strange"
description: "You can't infuse soul into AI," said Deepika Padukone while sharing what she thinks about the future of artificial intelligence
content:

title: AI boom drives Taiwan's exports to record $61.8 billion in October
description: Taiwan's exports in October surged 49.7% year-on-year to $61.8 billion, a record monthly high, driven by strong global demand for artificial intelligence technologies (AI), according to Focus Taiwan.
content:
Synopsis

title: AI boom drives Taiwan's exports to record $61.8 billion in October
description: Taiwan's exports in October surged 49.7 per cent year-on-year to USD 61.8 billion, a record monthly high, driven by strong global demand for artificial intelligence technologies (AI), according to Focus Taiwan.
content:
Taipei [Taiwan], November 8 (ANI): Taiwan's exports in October surged 49.7 per cent year-on-year to USD 61.8 billion, a record monthly high, driven by strong global demand for artificial intelligence technologies (AI), according to Focus Taiwan.

title: Breaking Bad creator Vince Gilligan slams AI as plagiarism machine
description: Vince Gilligan openly condemns artificial intelligence as a plagiarism machine and refuses to use it in his work. His criticism highlights concerns over AI's impact on creativity and ethical challenges in the tech industry.
content: Breaking Bad mastermind Vince Gilligan has declared war on artificial intelligence, branding it a “plagiarism machine” and vowing never to use it in his work. In true Gilligan fashion, the Emmy-winning writer didn’t hold back, calling AI “the world’s... [3829 chars]

title: Can you really talk to dead using AI? We tried out 'deathbots' so you don't have to
description: LONDON, Nov 8:  Artificial intelligence (AI) is increasingly being used to preserve the voices and stories of the dead. From text-based chatbots that mimic loved ones to voice avatars that let you “speak” with the deceased, a growing digital afterlife industry promises to make memory interactive, and, in some cases, eternal. In our research, recently published in Memory, Mind & Media, we explored what happens when remembering the dead is left to an algorithm. We even tried talking to digital […]
content:

title: India's Data Centre Capacity Set To Grow 5x To 8GW By 2030: Jefferies
description: According to the sectoral update by Jefferies, India's data centre capacity is expected to expand fivefold to 8GW by 2030, propelled by rising data consumption, growing cloud adoption, regulatory data localisation requirements, and increasing deployment of artificial intelligence (AI).
